title: Crypto’s Bonnie and Clyde: A love story told on social media
content:
Crypto’s Bonnie and Clyde had their (alleged) crime spree abruptly curtailed on Tuesday. Heather “Razzlekhan” Morgan and Ilya “Dutch” Lichtenstein were arrested for conspiring to launder bitcoin that’s now worth $4.5bn. While Bonnie and Clyde’s rise and fall played out in the press, their crypto counterparts chronicled their lives on social media. This is the love story of Dutch and Razzlekhan, the (alleged) crime couple who stole our hearts. Chapter 1: Love at first sight The couple hasn’t revealed how they first met, but they clearly had lots in common. Both share similar interests — and an astonishing range of…

description: It's a social media love story for the ages. This is how the (alleged) Bonnie and Clyde of crypto stole our hearts.
